item.title: Introducing e2immu
item.description: Hello there! After 16 months of full-time development, I’m proud to announce that e2immu is now public on GitHub as an open source project. e2immu is a static code analyser for Java. There’s a few analysers around already, but this one focuses strongly on immutability: determining when and where the data of an object gets modified, and ensuring that, after some initialisation phase, the content of certain objects can never be changed again.
